sentences.en: A worker put a prop against the wall of the tunnel to keep it from falling.
sentences.cn: 一名工人用东西支撑住隧道壁好使它不会倒塌.

sentences.en: Anna looks after costumes and props.
Can we prop the window open with something?
sentences.cn: 我们能不能用什么东西撑住窗户让它开着？

sentences.en: Clearing banks have large branch networks, which result in heavy prop 0 ery expenditure.
sentences.cn: 清算银行有庞大的分支网络, 结果导致巨大的财政支出.

sentences.en: Do not prop your feet up.
sentences.cn: 不要把你的脚翘放在(桌子上).

sentences.en: He is the only prop of mine.
He used a box to prop the door open.
sentences.cn: 他用盒子顶住门,让门开着.

sentences.en: If you have difficulty sitting like this, prop up your back against a wall.
sentences.cn: 如果这么坐着有困难，就背靠墙坐吧。

sentences.en: Money would prop up your head?
sentences.cn: 钱能支起你的头来 吗 ?

sentences.en: No cigarette should be used as a prop to depict an undesirable character.
sentences.cn: 香烟不能用作刻划不良分子的手段.

sentences.en: Prop the door open with a brick.
Regional Turbo - Prop and Regional Jet sales, Operating Leases and Wet Leases.
sentences.cn: 经营支线涡桨飞机和支线喷气式飞机租赁及湿租业务.

sentences.en: the government spent £3 billion in an attempt to prop up the pound.
sentences.cn: 政府用30亿英镑支撑英镑。

sentences.en: The prop fixes position, ensures that paper feed is accurate.
sentences.cn: 靠山定位, 保证送纸准确.

sentences.en: To support on or as if on crutches; prop up.
sentences.cn: 支撑支在或犹如支在拐杖上; 支撑.

sentences.en: Truth will stand without a prop.
sentences.cn: 真理无支援之时,亦能站得住脚.

sentences.en: Use this box to prop the door open.
We should prop up the fence.
sentences.cn: 我们应该用东西支撑住这栅栏.

trans.tran_cn: 支柱，支撑物，支持者，后盾，靠山，道具，（橄榄球中的）支柱前锋
trans.tran_en: a small object such as a book, weapon etc, used by actors in a play or film
to support something by leaning it against something, or by putting something else under, next to, or behind it

trans.tran_cn: 支撑，支持，维持，使倚靠在某物上
